movie.title: Fred & Rose West the Real Story with Trevor McDonald
movie.title_english: Fred & Rose West the Real Story with Trevor McDonald
movie.title_long: Fred & Rose West the Real Story with Trevor McDonald (2019)
movie.description_intro: Sir Trevor revisits the Cromwell Streets Murders, one of the most disturbing and chilling cases in British history.
movie.description_full: Sir Trevor revisits the Cromwell Streets Murders, one of the most disturbing and chilling cases in British history.

movies.title: Getting Blue in Color
movies.summary: A man works at a bank. He is the son of a yakuza thug. One day his father's gang fights another group of thugs and the son steps in and helps. The son's high school class-mate is also the son of a yakuza member. This man does not want to fight if he does not have to. The bank employee helps his father's group transform into a computer accessory company. He is expecting money from his girlfriend's rich father however.
movies.description_full: A man works at a bank. He is the son of a yakuza thug. One day his father's gang fights another group of thugs and the son steps in and helps. The son's high school class-mate is also the son of a yakuza member. This man does not want to fight if he does not have to. The bank employee helps his father's group transform into a computer accessory company. He is expecting money from his girlfriend's rich father however.

movies.title: Break
movies.summary: Spencer Pryde (Sam Gittins), a gifted snooker player is wasting his talents, choosing instead to indulge in petty crime with his mates, but when things begin spiralling out of control, he seeks sanctuary in the one place he feels safe, the local snooker hall. While there, he is presented with an opportunity to turn his life around after a chance encounter with a Chinese stranger named Qiang (David Yip). Qiang, a former 8-ball pool champion turned coach, tries to convince Spencer to turn pro. But, in order to make a new life for himself, Spencer will need to break away from his friends, his environment, and the negative elements of his current life.

movies.title: The Clan
movies.summary: The Puccios...? A model family! They are few, those that could match them. The father? A dignified man, (honest) storekeeper by trade, who cares about his five children, going as far as to supervise the homework of his youngest daughter. The mother? Both a dedicated teacher and a regular Martha Stewart. The children? Well-educated and promised to a bright future. Alejandro, for one, is already an admired rugby star. Except that... all this respectability is nothing but a smokescreen! The truth is that Arquimedes Puccio is also - and mainly - the tyrannical leader of a criminal gang composed of... his wife and children. Puccio's undercover activities ? Well, they consist in kidnapping rich people (preferably young), detaining them in his own house, torturing them gratuitously and doing away with them after cashing the ransom. The Puccios, a model family? Yes, but a model evil family!

movies.title: Charismata
movies.summary: Psychological horror about a police detective whose sanity begins to unravel as she investigates a series of brutal ritualistic murders.
movies.description_full: Psychological horror about a police detective whose sanity begins to unravel as she investigates a series of brutal ritualistic murders.
movies.synopsis: Psychological horror about a police detective whose sanity begins to unravel as she investigates a series of brutal ritualistic murders.
